articles.title: Don’t click on those road toll texts. FBI issues fresh warning about the smishing scam - The Associated Press
articles.description: The FBI is warning Americans not to respond to scam road toll collection texts after receiving more than 2,000 complaints this month. The texts impersonating state road toll collection agencies are attempting to get phone users to reveal financial information…
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) The FBI is warning Americans not to respond to scam road toll collection texts after receiving more than 2,000 complaints this month.
The texts impersonating state road toll collecti… [+1070 chars]
